Package jhd.DistanceMaps.libJ8

Class GeodesicTransformer

java.lang.Object
jhd.DistanceMaps.libJ8.GeodesicTransformer
public class GeodesicTransformer
extends java.lang.Object
A class for computing 2D and 3D geodesic transforms

  • Method Details

    • getMapChoices

      public java.lang.String[] getMapChoices()
      Used to build Dialogs
      Returns:
      A list of choices for the component to flood "Map 0","Map !0"

    • getSeedChoices2D

      public java.lang.String[] getSeedChoices2D()
      Used to build Dialogs
      Returns:
      A list of choices for the start of the GDT: "LeftEdge","RightEdge","TopEdge","BottomEdge","Point(s)"

    • getSeedChoices3D

      public java.lang.String[] getSeedChoices3D()
      Used to build Dialogs
      Returns:
      A list of choices for the start of the GDT: "LeftSlice","RightSlice","TopSlice","BottomSlice","FrontSlice","BackSlice","Point(s)"

    • gdt2D

      public float[] gdt2D​(float[] fData, int imgWidth, int imgHeight, float pixWidth, float pixHeight, java.lang.String mapChoice, java.lang.String seedChoice, int[] xPts, int[] yPts)
      3D Geodesic distance map
      Parameters:
      fData - A row major 1D float array containing a segmented (0 and non-0) 3D image
      imgWidth - The image width in pixels
      imgHeight - The height width in pixels
      pixWidth - The pixel width in user units
      pixHeight - The pixel height in user units
      mapChoice - "Map 0","Map !0"
      seedChoice - Choices are "FrontSlice","BackSlice","LeftSlice","RightSlice","TopSlice","BottomSlice","Point(s)"
      xPts - An array of seedPoint column indices, pass null if not using Point(s) choice
      yPts - An array of seedPoint row indices
      Returns:
      A 2D geodesic map of the selected map choice

    • gdt3D

      public float[] gdt3D​(float[] imgData, int imgWidth, int imgHeight, int imgDepth, float pixWidth, float pixHeight, float pixDepth, java.lang.String mapChoice, java.lang.String seedChoice, int[] xPts, int[] yPts, int[] zPts)
      3D Geodesic distance map
      Parameters:
      imgData - A row major 1D float array containing a segmented (0 and non-0) 3D image
      imgWidth - The image width in pixels
      imgHeight - The height width in pixels
      imgDepth - The depth or number of slices in the 3D image
      pixWidth - The pixel width in user units
      pixHeight - The pixel height in user units
      pixDepth - The pixel depth in user units
      mapChoice - "Map 0","Map !0"
      seedChoice - Choices are "FrontSlice","BackSlice","LeftSlice","RightSlice","TopSlice","BottomSlice","Point(s)"
      xPts - An array of seedPoint column indices, pass null if not using Point(s) choice
      yPts - An array of seedPoint row indices
      zPts - An array of seedPoint slice indices
      Returns:
      A 3D geodesic map of the selected map choice
